name: AudioFileMarkerList
desc: A list of markers associated with an audio file, including their SMPTE time type, the number of markers, and the markers themselves.

items.name: var mMarkers: (AudioFileMarker)
items.desc: An array of mNumberMarkers elements, each of which is an audio file marker.

items.name: var mNumberMarkers: UInt32
items.desc: The number of markers in the list.

items.name: var mSMPTE_TimeType: UInt32
items.desc: The SMPTE time type of the whole list of markers in an audio file.
